comment: In the online format, while there are "due dates", it shows everything due on the last day of the course. There is basically no interaction with her, the only thing she actually grades (not automatic) are the two discussions and the final, there are no lecture videos or helpful interaction on her part, the course may as well be run by a TA.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Lots of homework

comment: Very easy course. Weekly textbook reading, quizzes, and discussion. There is no final but instead there is a final project that was fairly easy. She is very very strict with deadlines and will not provide extensions so make sure you stay on top of things. Regardless, it was pretty easy to adhere to those deadlines so just don't procrastinate.

For the fall semester of 2023, I have to say that this is the best and great teacher that I have had. Even if I did take her class online, it's very important to keep up with the due dates because you wouldn't want to receive a bad grade, right? Overall, the teacher is very understanding and makes sure to turn your assignments in on time.

Very easy class, but her communication level is not always respectful. Her discussions aren't very clear, and the writing standard is set low. Easy to complete for quick grade from a student's perspective - but will give you a low grade for responding vaguely, when the original post is 2-3 sentences long. Grading wasn't realistic or flexible.

Class itself is easy, but this professor makes it very easy to fail the class. This was my second attempt at her class. I failed last semester because I was in a car accident and turned in my final project two hours late (10 pm EST). She doesn't answer emails or accept late assignments even if you have genuine reasons and evidence of those reasons.
rating_tags: Tough grader--Participation matters--Graded by few things

comment: Class consisted of quizzes, discussion posts, and the final! The work is fairly easy but she is very strict about completing things before the due date. She does not accept any late work, she's somewhat understanding but is firm with her syllabus guidelines. Nice professor but definitely keep up with the work if not you can easily fall behind!

Her course is easy, but she is a terrible person. She made me fail an assignment because of technical reasons I had no control of...and no, I did not wait until last minute to complete it. She told me to "figure it out" after explaining nothing can be fixed during weekend hours. Also, her schedule is unclear. Without the GroupMe, I would've failed
